$fairfax = Get-Content .\eslz\managementServices\policy\fairfax.policies.json | ConvertFrom-Json -Depth 100
$fairfax.variables.initiatives.policySetDefinitions.Count
$policySetDefinitions = $fairfax.variables.initiatives.policySetDefinitions

    $fielname = "policy-defset-" + $policySetDefinition.name
    $policySetDefinition | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 100 > eslz\managementServices\policy\testPolicySet\"$fielname.json"
}
